item.title: Simple & Clear MLB Pay
item.description:
Simple & Clear MLB Pay

There's something about a DNA Chart, especially when the data passes from positive, through zero to negative. It's delightfully clear not just who the top and bottom players are but also grabs your attention at how they compare with the overall average, something that a standard bar chart with an average reference line would struggle to do.

item.title: Complex Map with a Clear Picture
item.description:
Complex Map with a Clear Picture

I love how the detail and you could say complexity of this map actually makes the difficulties found in the region so much more clear. Had the map been simplified to a country level Â you'd see what we already know...countries have borders and they battle with each other.

item.title: Rain, Destruction and a Modern Mapping Stack - The Information Lab
item.description:
Rain, Destruction and a Modern Mapping Stack - The Information Lab

A modern mapping stack needs to be quick and easy to create, integrate and update. Just as Tableau and Alteryx can plow through any and all data from parsing to visualising, with the addition of Mapbox taking on GIS is just as simple. Here's how I recently put it to use.
